sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, useContext } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Typography, Button, IconButton, Accordion, AccordionSummary, AccordionDetails, Rating, Tabs, Tab, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Paper, Avatar, Chip, Box, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, } from '@mui/material'; import { ExpandMore, Favorite, FavoriteBorder, Share, Star, StarBorder, ShoppingCartOutlined, ThumbUpOutlined, VerifiedUser, Check, Wash, RemoveCircleOutline, Iron, DryCleaningOutlined, } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { TabPanel } from '../../../layout'; import Header from '../../../layout/Header'; import styles from './css/ProductDetail.module.css'; import ApiService from '../../../../ApiService'; import CartContext from '../../../../store/cart-context'; import { care, colors, details, fabricInfo, features, sizeChart, sizeGuide, sizes } from './data'; export default function ProductDetail() { // ... (이전 코드는 그대로 유지) return ( <>
{/* ... (이미지 캐러셀 부분은 그대로 유지) */}
{product.productName} {product.rprice > 0 ? ( <> {discountPercentage}% 할인 {product.rprice.toLocaleString()} 원 {product.oprice.toLocaleString()} 원 ) : ( {product.oprice.toLocaleString()} 원 )} 색상: {colors?.[0]} 사이즈 선택 {sizes.map((size) => ( ))} 배송 및 반품 무료 상품 평가 } icon={} /> {isFavorite ? : } }> 소재 {details?.join('\n')} }> 관리
    {care?.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
사이즈 측정 방법 {sizeGuide?.measurements?.map((item, index) => ( ))} 사이즈 정보 사이즈 허리단면 힙단면 밑위 허벅지단면 총장 밑단 {sizeChart?.map((row) => ( {row.size} {row.waist} {row.hip} {row.rise} {row.thigh} {row.length} {row.legOpening} ))}
원단 정보 {fabricInfo?.main} {fabricInfo?.details.map((detail, index) => ( ))} 세탁 및 관리 {fabricInfo?.care.map((instruction, index) => ( {instruction.icon === 'Wash' && } {instruction.icon === 'RemoveCircleOutline' && } {instruction.icon === 'Iron' && } {instruction.icon === 'DryCleaningOutlined' && } ))} 제품 특징
    {features?.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
리뷰 {product.reviews.length} {product.rating} 베스트 리뷰 {product.reviews.slice(0, 3).map((review) => ( {review.user[0]} {review.user} {review.verified && } {review.content} {review.images && review.images.length > 0 && ( {review.images.map((img, index) => ( ))} )} {review.helpful} ))} 리뷰 사진 {product.reviews .filter((review) => review.images && review.images.length > 0) .flatMap((review) => review.images) .map((img, index) => ( ))} 전체 리뷰 {product.reviews.map((review) => ( {review.user[0]} {review.user} {review.verified && } {review.date} {review.content} {review.images && review.images.length > 0 && ( {review.images.map((img, index) => ( ))} )} {review.helpful} ))} ); }
